name: shopsmart-real-time-threat-intelligence
description: *ShopSmart Solutions* is a secure and user-friendly e-commerce platform designed to provide a seamless online shopping experience. The project integrates *OSINT tools*, *Large Language Models (LLMs)*, and aligns with the *NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) 2.0* and *NIST Risk Management Framework (RMF)* to ensure robust cybersecurity and risk management.
